data.name: Tokyo Xanadu eX+: S-Pom Treat Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Tokyo Xanadu eX+; a massive action RPG! When high school student Kou Tokisaka encounters the nightmare realm known as the Eclipse, his world is forever changed.

To use the DLC items, they must be first claimed from within the game. To claim the DLC items in-game, open the "Camp Menu" screen, select the menu option "ITEM", and navigate to the DLC tab. From there, select each of the DLC items purchased that you wish to activate in-game.

The S-Pom Treat Bundle will provide you with the following:

S-Pom Treat Set 1

Three S-Pom treats, just for you!

S-Pom's Food x 3


S-Pom Treat Set 2

Three S-Pom treats, just for you!

S-Pom's Food x 3


S-Pom Treat Set 3

Three S-Pom treats, just for you!

S-Pom's Food x 3


S-Pom Value Treat Set 1

Six S-Pom treats, just for you!

S-Pom's Food x 6


S-Pom Value Treat Set 2

Six S-Pom treats, just for you!

S-Pom's Food x 6

data.short_description: A bundle of S-Pom treats to lure those elusive Poms and defeat them for an amazing amount of experience points and rare items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
